mapper.select: SELECT /* 현재 노선 기본 정보 조회 */ boardLine.* , bus.BUS_NUM , bus.DRIVER_NAME , bus.STTUS_CD as BUS_STTUS_CD FROM PRESCH_LINE boardLine JOIN PRESCH_BUS bus ON boardLine.BUS_ID = bus.BUS_ID WHERE boardLine.LINE_ID = #{lineId}

SELECT /* 현재 운행중인 노선 정보 조회 */ boardLine.* , bus.BUS_NUM , bus.DRIVER_NAME , bus.STTUS_CD as BUS_STTUS_CD , boardLineServcie.LINE_SERVICE_ID , boardLineServcie.SERVICE_TEACHER_ID , boardLineServcie.SERVICE_START_DT , boardLineServcie.SERVICE_END_DT , teacher.USER_ID , teacher.USER_NM , teacher.USER_TYPE , teacher.PROF_IMG_ID , teacher.CONTACT , teacher.CLS_ID , CONCAT('/', LOWER(file.FILE_TYPE), '/', file.FILE_NM) AS IMG_SRC FROM PRESCH_LINE boardLine JOIN PRESCH_BUS bus ON boardLine.BUS_ID = bus.BUS_ID LEFT JOIN PRESCH_LINE_SERVICE boardLineServcie ON boardLine.LINE_ID = boardLineServcie.LINE_ID AND SERVICE_START_DT >= CURRENT_DATE AND SERVICE_START_DT < adddate(CURRENT_DATE, 1) LEFT JOIN USER_INFO teacher ON boardLineServcie.SERVICE_TEACHER_ID = teacher.USER_ID LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO file ON teacher.PROF_IMG_ID = file.FILE_ID WHERE boardLine.LINE_ID = #{lineId}

SELECT /* 유치원 운행 노선 리스트 조회 */ boardLine.* , bus.BUS_NUM , bus.DRIVER_NAME , bus.STTUS_CD as BUS_STTUS_CD , boardLineServcie.LINE_SERVICE_ID , boardLineServcie.SERVICE_TEACHER_ID , boardLineServcie.SERVICE_START_DT , boardLineServcie.SERVICE_END_DT , teacher.USER_ID , teacher.USER_NM , teacher.USER_TYPE , teacher.PROF_IMG_ID , teacher.CONTACT , teacher.CLS_ID , CONCAT('/', LOWER(file.FILE_TYPE), '/', file.FILE_NM) AS IMG_SRC FROM PRESCH_LINE boardLine JOIN PRESCH_BUS bus ON boardLine.BUS_ID = bus.BUS_ID LEFT JOIN PRESCH_LINE_SERVICE boardLineServcie ON boardLine.LINE_ID = boardLineServcie.LINE_ID AND SERVICE_START_DT >= CURRENT_DATE AND SERVICE_START_DT < adddate(CURRENT_DATE, 1) LEFT JOIN USER_INFO teacher ON boardLineServcie.SERVICE_TEACHER_ID = teacher.USER_ID LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO file ON teacher.PROF_IMG_ID = file.FILE_ID WHERE boardLine.LINE_TYPE = #{lineType} AND boardLine.SCH_CD = #{schCd}
